extendedInfo.description: Sky Runner combines the classic arcade 'bomb runner' with modern graphics and advanced physics to create a multilevel arcade strategy game.Its simple to play. Tilt your device to move sky runner left and right, tap sky runner to drop water bombs.Put out the burning crates and save the distressed babies. If the babies get too upset then you will forfeit the level.Features :Uses the gyro sensor in your deviceAdvanced physics5 free levelsPinch to zoomClassic arcade gameplayLevels become progressively complex
